description: How to join the International Society for Phylogenetic Nomenclature.

types.name: Regular Family Member
types.description: Spouse or domestic partner of a Regular, Sustaining, Founding, or Life Member.

types.name: Student Member
types.note: Student membership requires the signature of the faculty advisor confirming that the applicant is a student.

types.name: Student Family Member
types.description: Spouse or domestic partner of a Student Member.

types.name: Life Family Member
types.description: Spouse or domestic partner of a Life Member — one-time payment. Or $10 each year — see Regular Family Member.

types.name: Donation
types.description: Make a donation to the Society.
